title: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
desc: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
org: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

records.QueryText: How many rupees are given under PAT Kisan Samman Nidhi Yojana?
records.KccAns: Under the Kisan Bhai Pt. Kisan Samman Nidhi Yojna, you will get 6000 rupees annually.
DRY WEATHER, NO CHANCE OF RAINFALL IN YOUR AREA

records.QueryText: asking about Pruning and fertilizer management in Citrus
records.KccAns: Recommended for Pruning for November month and then apply FYM 30kg / tree

records.QueryText: asked about planting season for cucumber?
records.KccAns:
Planting season
Cucumber plantation was in Kharif and summer season. For the kharif season, the cultivation of Kakadi is done in the month of June and in the summer season in January.
